item.title: ðŸŸ¢ Xcode Cloud: Outage (resolved)
item.description:
Started: 06/12/2025 11:30 PDT
Ended: 06/12/2025 14:30 PDT
This service was disrupted, but is now stable.
Some users were affected

item.title: ðŸŸ¢ Apple Podcasts Connect: Performance (resolved)
item.description:
Started: 06/12/2025 11:43 PDT
Ended: 06/12/2025 13:23 PDT
Users experienced a problem with this service.
Some users were affected
Affected Services: App Store Connect, App Store Connect API, Apple Music API, Apple Music for Artists, Apple Podcasts Connect

item.description:
